entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
